item.title: Chancellor is OKCPS Teacher of the Year – 2017-2018
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
Anthony Chancellor, the Leadership class teacher at Belle Isle Middle School, is the new Teacher of the Year for Oklahoma City Public Schools, 2017-2018. The first runner-up is Dwight Cunkle, music teacher at Horace Mann Elementary School. And, second runner-up is Joanna Eldridge, a special education teacher at Edgemere Elementary School. The winners will receive […]

The post Chancellor is OKCPS Teacher of the Year – 2017-2018 appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: Science teacher named 2018 state Teacher of the Year
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
Oklahoma’s Teacher of the Year is Donna Gradel, who teaches environmental science at Broken Arrow High School. She has taught in the district for 21 years. In her acceptance speech Gradel revealed the many great aspects and importance of teaching. “Teaching has created so many opportunities for my students and I,” said Gradel. She said […]

The post Science teacher named 2018 state Teacher of the Year appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: Putnam City teacher named finalist for Okla teacher of the Year
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
Neeli Boyd is one of the 12 finalists for Oklahoma teacher of the Year. The eight-year veteran teaches first grade at Wiley Post Elementary, 6920 W. Britton Road, in Putnam City Schools. The district covers most of the west OKC metro. The finalists were chosen from among teachers of the year from each district whose […]

The post Putnam City teacher named finalist for Okla teacher of the Year appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: Madison Wingate is OKCPS Teacher of the Year
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
Madison Wingate received the Teacher of the Year award Tuesday at the 2017 Stars of Education Award celebration. She is a Pre-Kindergarten teacher at Pierce Elementary School, 2701 S. Tulsa Ave., Oklahoma City. She was chosen from among nine finalists who submitted extensive portfolios, turned in classroom videos of their teaching, and went through several […]
